imdb.title: Natsume yûjinchô
imdb.plot: When Natsume Takashi inherits a book that belonged to his late grandmother he realizes the book is filled with the names of spirits she defeated and bound to her will. He then decides to return their names so they can be free once...

episodes.title: The Days Eater
episodes.plot: Natsume helped a spirit Tsukihigui. Tsukihigui makes him younger in return for his help, he loses his memory as he becomes a child.

episodes.title: It Blooms Tomorrow
episodes.plot: Natsume catches the pattern of beautiful flower on some rocks and stones. He learns that is the work of spirits called Ishiarai who purifies them.

episodes.title: Nitai-sama
episodes.plot: Shibata talk to Natsume about a house where dolls cursed. Natsume and Tanuma go to investigate the house.

episodes.title: Lying Eyes
episodes.plot: Natsume and Nyanko-sensei found Natori's paper doll which time and place was written in downtown, Natsume worries about Natori. They go to that place, and then get to know a girl named Tsukiko.

episodes.title: The Bound Ones
episodes.plot: Tsukiko is daughter of Natori's master Takuma. She asked Natori for help because something unusual has happened at Takuma's house since Takuma lost his ability.

episodes.title: Nishimura and Kitamoto
episodes.plot: Natsume's friends reflect on how they met him, and the difference he made in their lives. He's found a home, and he means a lot to the people who live there.

episodes.title: Gomochi's Benefactor
episodes.plot: Natsume is surprised when a youkai comes to seek Reiko in gratitude. Years ago, the youkai's to-be-bride received freedom from her help, and now is about to be wed. They invite Natsume to the wedding.

episodes.title: Day That Will Someday Come
episodes.plot: Natsume talks to a teenage boy at the station, who turns out to be a youkai that left a human because of their feelings for one another. The boy wants to find her because he received a wedding invitation

episodes.title: What Flows
episodes.plot: After a flood occurs on Four Mask Hill during Natsume's summer school session, a mask randomly appearing in the school worries Natsume.

episodes.title: The Sealed Room
episodes.plot: A competition is opened to search for a famous researcher's sealed room and many exorcists are gathered. Natsume decides to go, as he may find information regarding the Book of Friends.

episodes.title: What Matters
episodes.plot: Natsume decides to tell Natori about his secret, when the search for the seal room ends.

episodes.title: Unchanging Form
episodes.plot: Natsume is depressed to hear unpleasant stories about his grandmother Reiko's past from a relative. In addition a girl spirit confuses Natsume with Reiko, and she brands him/her as a thief.

episodes.title: Mischievous Rain
episodes.plot: A girl spirit comes to see Natsume who got an old towel on his school road. She said the towel is hers, and she wants to give it back to its first owner.

episodes.title: The Letter from the Exorcist
episodes.plot: Natsume received a letter from Matoba. However he lost it before he read because he was embroiled in an unknown exorcist's battle.

episodes.title: Shadow of Linked Chains
episodes.plot: Matoba invites Natsume to the meeting of the exorcists. This meeting means that Matoba will find out someone who attacks the exorcists.

episodes.title: It Must Not Be Bound
episodes.plot: Natsume finds something that a spirit wrote on blackboard at high school.

episodes.title: Soundless Valley
episodes.plot: Natsume was attacked by a spirit and he lost his voice temporarily, however he was saved by another spirit Hidaka. Hidaka confuses Natsume with Reiko.

episodes.title: Distant Festival Lights
episodes.plot: Natsume, Tanuma and their friends go to help an inn Tamuma's relative run. They meet people who know Tanuma's childhood well.

episodes.title: A World Unbent
episodes.plot: Natori was born in a family of exorcist who was closed business. His family gave him the cold shoulder because of his ability. When he was a high school student, he knew exorcists Matoba and Takuma each other.

episodes.title: Following a Narrow Path
episodes.plot: To run from a spirit aim at "The Book of Friends", Natsume damaged another spirit Mitsuzara's precious hat. Mitsuzara orders Natsume to help him instead of apology.

episodes.title: Touko and Shigeru
episodes.plot: When Shigeru and Touko lived by themselves, Touko saved a crow. Meanwhile, Shigeru saw a lonely boy at his relative's funeral.

episodes.title: To the Ephemeral Ones
episodes.plot: Two spirits called "Intermediate" forced Natsume to climb a mountain where beautiful flowers blooming. Because of that, Natsume has a terrible cold in bed.

episodes.title: Torawareta Natsume
episodes.plot: Natsume encounters some strange, monkey-mask wearing demons while out in a forest. They want the book of friends, and start physically threatening him until Natsume is saved by Nyanko-Sensei.

episodes.title: Touhou no mori
episodes.plot: Natsume and Matoba talk, but when the conversation doesn't go the way he wants, Matoba orders Natsume to be put in a cell.

episodes.title: Chisaki mono
episodes.plot: Natsume befriends a small fluffball Youkai.

episodes.title: Daitou
episodes.plot: A spirit Yobiko asks Natsume to call a spirit Karikami using "The Book of Friends". Yobiko wants to be able to read old unreadable letters with Karikami's ability.

episodes.title: Sugishi hi no kimi ni
episodes.plot: In the town Natsume used to live in, a girl recalls Natsume. She remembers his strange actions and wanted to understand him. Meanwhile, Natsume encounters a small Youkai which reminds him of the same girl and town.

episodes.title: Garasu no muko
episodes.plot: Natsume is trapped in a bottle by a youkai to be offered to another named Omibashira.

episodes.title: Hito to No Made
episodes.plot: Natsume is saved by Tanuma and the two escape from the banquet hall with the help of Natori, who was disguised as a youkai.

episodes.title: Madoi shi koro ni
episodes.plot: Nyanko-sensei falls into a well and discovers that there is a barrier inside it, as well as Nanase, Matoba's assistant.

episodes.title: Tsukiwake matsuri
episodes.plot: Natori is tasked with the job of finding and breaking the seal of Houzukigami, a god that was to participate in the Moon-Splitting Festival done every 10 years against Fuzukigami, another god.

episodes.title: Matsurareta kamisama
episodes.plot: Natsume is pretending to be the god Houzukigami, so the moon splitting festival will end with a victory and the mountain will not be ruined. Winning the contest will not be easy, but with help from Natori he will find the way.

episodes.title: Ichi mai no shashin
episodes.plot: Natsume looks back at a photo of his parents, and old wounds are reopened. Natsume is having a fun day with his friends, but all of a sudden he gets a phone call.

episodes.title: Kioku no tobira
episodes.plot: Natsume, accompanied by Nyanko-sensei, set out to visit his old home. He visits a relative to pick up the key to the house, but is being followed by a youkai who wants him to draw a mouth for it.

episodes.title: Tooki ieji
episodes.plot: A dangerous spirits Mushikui enters into Natsume's mind, and lets him to dream about sad memories when he lived at Miyoko's house.

episodes.title: Ayashiki mono no na
episodes.plot: Natsume saw a spirit running around his house to inform that disaster will come. He decides to avoid involving spirits.

episodes.title: Ukihara no sato
episodes.plot: A female spirit asks Natsume for help. She says she got separated from her older brother traveling together to return their hometown.

episodes.title: Itsuwari no yûjin
episodes.plot: Shibata who was a Natsume's old classmate asks Natsume to meet his girlfriend named Murasaki.

episodes.title: Osanaki hibi ni
episodes.plot: When Natsume was younger, there was a big tree in his school road, and a female spirit lived on the tree. She was often teasing him, but he was too young to understand her behavior.

episodes.title: Kura ni hisomu mono
episodes.plot: Natsume and Tanuma help to clean up a storehouse of Taki family. There are a lot of rare items, because her grandfather had studied spirits. Natsume notices one of talisman kimonos is lost.

episodes.title: Hito naranu mono
episodes.plot: Natsume finds some spirits who are bleeding and fall down in a shrine's hall.

episodes.title: Haraiya
episodes.plot: With the help of Natori, Natsume was looking for someone who robs the spirit's blood. During the investigation, Natsume meets the young head of a famous exorcist clan, Seiji Matoba.

episodes.title: Kogitsune no tokei
episodes.plot: Natsume and Shigeru go on a trip to participate in a pottery class. Hinoe says there are herbs grows that is effective for wound of Nyanko-sensei.

episodes.title: Akikaze kitte
episodes.plot: An unknown stone is in the school bag of Natsume who came home, suddenly it murmurs something. Hinoe kick it out of the window luckily, but Natsume has a bad feeling.

episodes.title: Wareta kagami
episodes.plot: Natsume found something glittering on the tree, and then that light got into his eyes.

episodes.title: Utsusu mono
episodes.plot: Natsume worried about Tanuma, he decides to stay at Tanuma's house with Nyanko-sensei.

episodes.title: Kaeru basho
episodes.plot: A dangerous spirit who knows Natsume's lonely childhood appears, Natsume comes down with a fever.

episodes.title: Natsume yûgichô
episodes.plot: Natsume reluctantly participated in a party of some spirits he has befriended. The spirits drank, got excited, and then ask Natsume to teach a human child's play.

episodes.title: Ubawareta yûjinchô
episodes.plot: Natsume finds a black cat looks very much alike of Nyanko-sensei except fur color. He confuses the cat with Nyanko-sensei, and brings it back.

episodes.title: Haru ni tokeru
episodes.plot: A snowy day, Natsume and Nyanko-sensei went for a walk to Shibanohara. There seemed to be two statues of the forest guardian deity, but now there is only one.

episodes.title: Ayakashi taiji yukemuri iki
episodes.plot: Natori, Natsume and Nyanko-sensei go on a hot spring trip. At that inn, they listen to the noise from the closet and watch a woman wearing a kimono hang from the ceiling.

episodes.title: Hina, kaeru
episodes.plot: There is a mysterious egg just born in the garden of Fujiwara's house. Natsume and Nyanko-sensei can't miss it and try to hatch.

episodes.title: Yakusoku no ki
episodes.plot: Kirinoha, a timidly spirit asks Natsume to return his name. Kirinoha says that Reiko said she would return his name after 50 years, and then tied the paper that wrote his name to a branch in a forest.

episodes.title: Shôjo no jin
episodes.plot: Natsume saw a teenage girl who draws something on the ground. Though he speaks, she runs away without saying anything. Next morning, a spirit who grew small mustache asks Natsume to stop that a human girl draws some ominous magic circles.

episodes.title: Yondewa naranu
episodes.plot: Natsume became a friend with Taki, a girl who drew some ominous magic circles. He and Nyanko-sensei try to protect her from an evil spirit.

episodes.title: Fushi no omoi
episodes.plot: Natsume goes to study training camp with Nishimura and Kitamoto. They are having a good time, but a mermaid attacks Natsume to take away "The Book of Friends".

episodes.title: Sakura namiki no kare
episodes.plot: From the day Natsume have gotten a picture of a row of cherry blossom trees denuded of their leaves in winter, his room is full of cherry blossom petals when he wakes up every morning.

episodes.title: Kariie
episodes.plot: The paranormal phenomena began to occur in Fujiwara's house. Shigeru tells Natsume that he had the same experiences in the house when he was a child, and then a mysterious teenage girl helped him.

episodes.title: Jujutsushi no kai
episodes.plot: Natori invites Natsume to the exorcist's meeting. Natsume thinks that it might be able to find out what he can do in the people who share the same power and the same suffering.

episodes.title: Haioku no shônen
episodes.plot: Natsume rescued Kai, a boy who was trapped in a box at an abandoned house with rumors that paranormal phenomena occur. Natsume heard that spirits are pursuing Kai, it reminds of his own childhood and he wants to protect Kai.

episodes.title: Hito to ayakashi
episodes.plot: Kai distrusts Natsume because he saw Natsume and Natori were together.

episodes.title: Neko to yûjinchô
episodes.plot: A teenage boy, Takashi Natsume has had the ability to see spirits, but he hasn't known the way of dealing with them. One day, he is chased by a spirit, and run into a shrine. Then he encounters another spirit in Chinese-lucky-cat shape.

episodes.title: Tsuyukami no hokora
episodes.plot: Natsume inherited "The Book of Friends" from Reiko, his grandmother, and decides to return the name to the spirits. A spirit Tsuyugami come to see him soon, to return his name. But the page with his name had stuck to the next page.

episodes.title: Yatsubara no kaijin
episodes.plot: Natsume realizes a transfer student named Tanuma also has the ability to see spirits, and hopes that he may be an understanding person.

episodes.title: Shigure to shôjo
episodes.plot: Natsume participates "trial of courage" in the class at the abandoned school building where a spirit has appeared. The class president Sasada is vaguely aware of Natsume's secret.

episodes.title: Kokoro iro no kippu
episodes.plot: Natsume finds a train ticket from Reiko's belongings. When he arrives at the station written on the ticket, there is a furry spirit named Santo waiting for Reiko.

episodes.title: Swallow at the Lake Bottom
episodes.plot: Natsume finds a town that had been submerged in water; Natsume gets possessed by a yokai and falls unconscious. Tarusaru informs Natsume about a festival and a Yukata that can turn a spirit into a human for a day.

episodes.title: Kogitsune no boshi
episodes.plot: Natsume who went to study training camp rescues little fox spirit from bullying spirits. The little fox spirit knows that Natsume has "The Book of Friends", he wants to be a follower of Natsume.

episodes.title: Hakanai hikari
episodes.plot: Natsume and Nyanko-sensei came seeing fireflies at a certain swamp. They find a strange couple, a man who looks at the swamp and a female spirit who is close to him.

episodes.title: Ayakashi barai
episodes.plot: Natsume get to know Shuuichi Natori who is a famous actor and an efficient exorcist. Natsume perceives that he has hatred for spirits.

episodes.title: Asagi no koto
episodes.plot: Akagane, one of spirits demanded Natsume to be possessed with his friend spirit Asagi because he wanted to treat her illness.

episodes.title: Nyanko tsurezure-chô
episodes.plot: Nyanko-sensei had a quarrel with Natsume, and then left the house of Fujiwara family suddenly.

episodes.title: Itsuka jirushi
episodes.plot: Natsume have been cursed because he saw an evil spirit who was eating spirits. He decides to break the curse without involving his precious people and spirits.

episodes.title: Aki no yaen
episodes.plot: Tanuma realizes that Nyanko-sensei is a kind of spirits. He worries about Natsume's life.
